data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Dasypolia Guenée, 1852 from the Russian part of the Altai Mountain Country, with descriptions of two new species (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V. (2012): A review of the genus Dasypolia Guenée, 1852 from the Russian part of the Altai Mountain Country, with descriptions of two new species (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae). Zootaxa 3478: 416-428, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282297
